overview: Brandon and Carly were at one time totally in love, but since their breakup years ago a lot has changed. Brandon’s moved on with a new girl and Carly - well, she can’t seem to let the past go. So, when Carly and Brandon reconnect years later and her feelings are still raw, she hopes that the two might be able to rekindle what they once had. But, when Brandon makes it clear he’s moved on - Carly does too…by growing closer to his best friend, Drew. However, in the rule of love - you don’t have sex with your best friend’s girl - even if she is an ex. Will Drew and Carly be able to resist the temptation or will Brandon realize that maybe his first love could be his newest love?
tagline: Is the risk worth the reward?
title: My Best Friend's Girl
